charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1) and 841(b)(1)(C); NARCOTICS - POSSESSION; Unlawful Possession with Intent to Distribute Heroin.(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Sentenced to Eighteen (18) Months Incarceration with credit for time served, followed by Thirty-Six (36) Months of Supervised Release; A $100.00 Special Assessment is imposed; No fine is imposed. Appeal Rights given.

charges.charge_description: 18:922(g)(1); UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC.; Unlawful Possession of a Firearm and Ammunition by a Person Convicted of a Crime Punishable by Imprisonment for a Term Exceeding One Year.(2)

charges.charge_disposition: DISMISSED BY ORAL MOTION OF THE GOVERNMENT.

charges.charge_description: 18:924(c)(1); VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN; Using, Carrying and Possessing a Firearm During a Drug Trafficking Offense.(3)

charges.charge_disposition: DISMISSED BY ORAL MOTION OF THE GOVERNMENT.
